name: LuwTeds
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare #41 whose theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

Can you find all the genres in this game?

I recommend playing it more than once.

Game may take a while to load, do not be alarmed by the gray screen.

And depending on your computer, you might want to download the game instead of using the webplayer.
